credit_line: Gift of George W. George, Class of 1941
title: The Sharpest Quill
medium: graphite | ink | white ink | on paper
inscriptions: u.c. in ink: THE SHARPEST QUILL- [crossed out]; l.r. in image in ink: GRUBE/OLDBERG; l.c. in pencil: 7  1/4" wide[encircled]; l.r. in pencil: 3 PM/ for Today; verso l.l. in pencil: 123[encircled]; verso l.r. in pencil: 42[encircled]; verso l.r.: [remenant of old pink label]
